items.content_html: I see lots of people talking about the ‚ÄúSnow Leopard‚Äù releases of iOS and macOS as meaning focusing on quality. But Snow Leopard also had a 2 year lifecycle and spanned 10.6.0-10.6.8. Will those days of 2 years between major OS releases come back?

I really like this post from Manton Reece about how he‚Äôs setting up micro.blog. I took analytics off my site (which were meager at best) because after posting something, I‚Äôd check the dashboard regularly. I don‚Äôt want to be writing for the (nonexistent) numbers anymore.
I know portrait mode isn‚Äôt perfect, but it can be pretty darn good.
There‚Äôs an irony to keeping my LastPass password and OTP token inside 1Password.
Been wondering for weeks why I couldn‚Äôt get port forwarding to work on my Airport Extreme. Turns out, I was forwarding the port to the wrong internal IP. ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

I think my favorite feature of the iPhone X is the battery life. I routinely use it all day listening to Apple Music and Overcast and routinely have around 50% battery at the end of the day. From 5am to 10pm. Just amazing!
I think I‚Äôm raising this one correctly.
I really want to up my Moom game. Window management (especially when going from lid-closed single window) has become a huge pain point.
